title: League won't open
body: Last night my account would not play so I closed and restarted the program. Now the program will start to open for a second and then close. I have tried reinstalling, and it still does not work. I have also restarted my computer. Any suggestions?

replies.body: Try updating your permissions really quickly with this [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). Should be a relatively quick and easy troubleshooting step, but definitely, let me know if that doesn't help so I can dig a little deeper for you!
I have same problem, i tried everything. I sawed all videos and read every article about similar problem. nothing works
